Headline: 59 59th/61st Temporary Reroute at 59th/Halsted
ShortDescription: 59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 59th, Halsted, 63rd, Union, 59th & Halsted due to fire department activity near 59th/Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip

#59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 59th, Halsted, 63rd, Union, 59th and Halsted due to fire department activity near 59th/Halsted.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Westbound Reroute near Harrison/Damen
ShortDescription: Westbound 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Ogden, Van Buren, Damen, and Jackson: due to, street blockage near Harrison/Damen.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Ogden, Van Buren, Damen, and Jackson: due to, street blockage near Harrison/Damen.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running with delays at 47th due to a door problem.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running with delays at 47th due to a door problem.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
